content: Feb 25 Data analytics software maker Splunk Inc  forecast full-year revenue far ahead of analysts' estimates  sending the company's shares up 11 percent in after-market trading.
name: Splunk Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Data analytics provider Splunk's revenue forecast beats estimates

content: Data analytics software maker Splunk Inc reported a 49 percent rise in quarterly revenue as businesses increasingly turn to data analytics to secure their networks from a surge in highly sophisticated cyber attacks.
name: Splunk Inc
title: Data analytics software maker Splunk's revenue jumps 49 percent
